snippet: The report, from leading security experts, also found that while the government has focused on the high-voltage power grid, less work has been done on the lower-voltage distribution system.
lead_paragraph: The report, from leading security experts, also found that while the government has focused on the high-voltage power grid, less work has been done on the lower-voltage distribution system.

headline.main: Report Calls for Better Backstops to Protect Power Grid From Cyberattacks
headline.print_headline: Report Calls for Better Backstops to Protect Power Grid From Cyberattacks
